meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ben Almoite Ellen Huber Amelia Hershberger Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7214.

td.p: Ben Almoite, a government and law librarian from Richmond, Virginia
Ellen Huber, a human resources director from Morrisville, Pennsylvania
Amelia Hershberger, a management analyst from Albany, New York (whose 2-day cash winnings total $37,000)

tr.td: THERE'S NO PLACE LIKE HOME
I'M THE KING OF THE WORLD
I'LL HAVE WHAT SHE'S HAVING
IF YOU BUILD "IT", HE WILL COME
THE DUDE ABIDES
MOVIE CATCHPHRASES

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Steel titan Andrew Carnegie helped transform American industry but was born in this country')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Steel titan Andrew Carnegie helped transform American industry but was born in this country
